## goup-util workspace add

Add a module to the workspace

### Synopsis

Add a module to the Go workspace using 'go work use'.

The module path should be relative to the workspace root.

```
goup-util workspace add <module-path> [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -f, --force   Force addition without confirmation
  -h, --help    help for add
```

* [goup-util workspace](goup-util_workspace.md)	 - Manage Go workspace files
